Detailed Description

Renderable class that provides functionality for rendering text in the scene.

Remarks:
This class uses bitmap fonts and HGE's own .fnt format. A tool is available with the HGE sdk to make generating this file easier.

Definition at line 118 of file TextRenderable.cpp.

void TextRenderable::render ( SceneNode *const   node,
const hgeVector &  screenPosition,
Camera *const   cam 
) [virtual]

Core render method.

The other render methods call this method once it has been determined that the object should be rendered. This is the Template method.

Parameters:
node The node whose position, rotation, and scale are going to be used to render the object.
screenPosition The position to render the object at transformed into screen space.

Implements Renderable.
